title: Mi skill set
description: I've become a proficient web developer with a broad set of skills, able to adpot new tools with ease. I am excelent working in teams and think communication goes a long way, I want to collab with people who motivate me to challenge myself and expand my horizons.

logTech.title: LogTech
logTech.description: I've worked two years as a backend developer for a company that offers heavy-weight transport logistic solutions. Here, I developed and maintained many of their services; third-party APIs such as GPS providers and payment gateways, automated business processes, gathered and curated data for analytics, and more.
